channel.title: Schd on Archive 03
channel.description: Recent content in Schd on Archive 03

item.title: Building a Pension with Dividends? Let's Dive into the $SCHD ETF
item.description: A deep dive into America’s leading dividend growth ETF, $SCHD. Through a debate between Kurumi, who champions its steady cash flow and stability, and Mikael, who points out its growth limitations and interest rate risks, find out if $SCHD is the right fit for your retirement portfolio.

item.title: The SCHD and QQQ Combo: Is It Really That Powerful? (A Deep Dive into the Pros and Cons)
item.description: QQQ, the standard-bearer for growth stocks, and SCHD, the symbol of value. Is this the perfect combination? From the synergy of explosive growth and stable cash flow to the risks of US-only exposure and value traps, three unique characters break it all down.
